00255 typedef struct  _AVR32_RxTdDescriptor {
00256   unsigned int addr;
00257   union
00258   {
00259     unsigned int status;
00260     struct {
00261       unsigned int BroadCast:1;
00262       unsigned int MultiCast:1;
00263       unsigned int UniCast:1;
00264       unsigned int ExternalAdd:1;
00265       unsigned int Res1:1;
00266       unsigned int Sa1Match:1;
00267       unsigned int Sa2Match:1;
00268       unsigned int Sa3Match:1;
00269       unsigned int Sa4Match:1;
00270       unsigned int TypeID:1;
00271       unsigned int VlanTag:1;
00272       unsigned int PriorityTag:1;
00273       unsigned int VlanPriority:3;
00274       unsigned int Cfi:1;
00275       unsigned int EndOfFrame:1;
00276       unsigned int StartOfFrame:1;
00277       unsigned int Rxbuf_off:2;
00278       unsigned int Res0:1;
00279       unsigned int Length:11;
00280     }S_Status;
00281   }U_Status;
00282 }AVR32_RxTdDescriptor, *AVR32P_RxTdDescriptor;
00284 
00287 
00288 typedef struct _AVR32_TxTdDescriptor {
00289   unsigned int addr;
00290   union
00291   {
00292     unsigned int status;
00293     struct {
00294       unsigned int BuffUsed:1;
00295       unsigned int Wrap:1;
00296       unsigned int TransmitError:1;
00297       unsigned int TransmitUnderrun:1;
00298       unsigned int BufExhausted:1;
00299       unsigned int Res1:10;
00300       unsigned int NoCrc:1;
00301       unsigned int LastBuff:1;
00302       unsigned int Res0:4;
00303       unsigned int Length:11;
00304     }S_Status;
00305   }U_Status;
00306 }AVR32_TxTdDescriptor, *AVR32P_TxTdDescriptor;
00308 
00310 #define AVR32_OWNERSHIP_BIT   0x00000001
00311 
00314 
00315 #define AVR32_BROADCAST_ADDR  ((unsigned int) (1 << 31))  //* Broadcat address detected
00316 #define AVR32_MULTICAST_HASH  ((unsigned int) (1 << 30))  //* MultiCast hash match
00317 #define AVR32_UNICAST_HASH    ((unsigned int) (1 << 29))  //* UniCast hash match
00318 #define AVR32_EXTERNAL_ADDR   ((unsigned int) (1 << 28))  //* External Address match
00319 #define AVR32_SA1_ADDR        ((unsigned int) (1 << 26))  //* Specific address 1 match
00320 #define AVR32_SA2_ADDR        ((unsigned int) (1 << 25))  //* Specific address 2 match
00321 #define AVR32_SA3_ADDR        ((unsigned int) (1 << 24))  //* Specific address 3 match
00322 #define AVR32_SA4_ADDR        ((unsigned int) (1 << 23))  //* Specific address 4 match
00323 #define AVR32_TYPE_ID         ((unsigned int) (1 << 22))  //* Type ID match
00324 #define AVR32_VLAN_TAG        ((unsigned int) (1 << 21))  //* VLAN tag detected
00325 #define AVR32_PRIORITY_TAG    ((unsigned int) (1 << 20))  //* PRIORITY tag detected
00326 #define AVR32_VLAN_PRIORITY   ((unsigned int) (7 << 17))  //* PRIORITY Mask
00327 #define AVR32_CFI_IND         ((unsigned int) (1 << 16))  //* CFI indicator
00328 #define AVR32_EOF             ((unsigned int) (1 << 15))  //* EOF
00329 #define AVR32_SOF             ((unsigned int) (1 << 14))  //* SOF
00330 #define AVR32_RBF_OFFSET      ((unsigned int) (3 << 12))  //* Receive Buffer Offset Mask
00331 #define AVR32_LENGTH_FRAME    ((unsigned int) 0x0FFF)     //* Length of frame
00333 
00334 /* Transmit Status definition */
00336 #define AVR32_TRANSMIT_OK     ((unsigned int) (1 << 31))  //*
00337 #define AVR32_TRANSMIT_WRAP   ((unsigned int) (1 << 30))  //* Wrap bit: mark the last descriptor
00338 #define AVR32_TRANSMIT_ERR    ((unsigned int) (1 << 29))  //* RLE:transmit error
00339 #define AVR32_TRANSMIT_UND    ((unsigned int) (1 << 28))  //* Transmit Underrun
00340 #define AVR32_BUF_EX          ((unsigned int) (1 << 27))  //* Buffers exhausted in mid frame
00341 #define AVR32_TRANSMIT_NO_CRC ((unsigned int) (1 << 16))  //* No CRC will be appended to the current frame
00342 #define AVR32_LAST_BUFFER     ((unsigned int) (1 << 15))  //*
